title: Before you start

intro.p1: We're building a new service. Different designs are being tested and changed based on feedback from users.
intro.p2: You'll be asked some questions to check you're eligible to use this service.

explanation: To make your claim, you'll need the following information to hand:
bulletPoints: Information about the type of notice you've given and when it was given (if applicable)
Details about the property you'd like to claim possession of
Your grounds for possession and details about your reasons for making a possession claim
